reviewtext: I just picked up a set at Fry's at lunch, and agree with the others here that they are comfortable and sound very good. Unfortunately, the soft earcups are very susceptible to any little noise source, including movement of eyeglass frames and touching/scratching your cheek. I really wish that stores would have headphones on display so that you could find things like this out at the store. I also think that the earcups will get hot and sweaty with extended use. So far the Bose TriPorts are the only units that I have found that are comfortable and don't create this noise from rubbing, but I don't particularly like their sound, plus they cost twice what these do.
summary: Great Sound, Comfortable, but Beware Eyeglasses Wearers!
